name: Tarantula #14
description: The demonic enforcer of the Tarantula Tribe.
backstory: Emerging from the darkest nightmares, this terrifying enforcer delights in spreading fear and chaos. Its blood-red eyes and razor-sharp fangs are the last things many see before meeting their doom. The very ground trembles at its approach, and even the bravest warriors flee at the sound of its bone-chilling battle cry.
